verses.verse: And he brought me back <S%H7725><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>; and <S%H4325><s%>, behold, waters issued out <S%H3318><s%> from under the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> eastward <S%H6921><s%>; (for the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> was toward the east <S%H6921><s%>;) and the waters <S%H4325><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from under <S%H3233><s%>, from the right side <S%H3802><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, on the south <S%H5045><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

Then he brought me out <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, and led me round by the way <S%H1870><s%> without unto the outer <S%H2351><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> that looketh <S%H6437><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%>; and <S%H6379><s%>, behold, there ran out waters <S%H4325><s%> on the right <S%H3233><s%> side <S%H3802><s%>.

When the man <S%H376><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> eastward <S%H6921><s%> with the line <S%H6957><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and he caused me to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%>, waters <S%H4325><s%> that were to the ankles <S%H657><s%>.

Again he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>, and caused me to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%>, waters <S%H4325><s%> that were to the knees <S%H1290><s%>. Again he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>, and caused me to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%>, waters that were to the loins <S%H4975><s%>.

Afterward he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>; and it was a river <S%H5158><s%> that I could <S%H3201><s%> not pass through <S%H5674><s%>; for the waters <S%H4325><s%> were risen <S%H1342><s%>, waters <S%H4325><s%> to swim in <S%H7813><s%>, a river <S%H5158><s%> that could not be passed through <S%H5674><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, hast thou seen <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H3212><s%>? Then he brought me <S%H7725><s%>, and caused me to return to the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%>.
Now when I had returned <S%H7725><s%>, behold <S%H8193><s%>, upon the bank of the river <S%H5158><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> trees on the one side and on the other <S%H6086><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H4325><s%>, These waters issue forth <S%H3318><s%> toward the eastern <S%H6930><s%> region <S%H1552><s%>, and shall go down <S%H3381><s%> into the Arabah <S%H6160><s%>; and they shall go <S%H935><s%> toward the sea <S%H3220><s%>; into the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall the waters go which were made to issue forth <S%H3318><s%>; and the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall be healed <S%H7495><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H5315><s%>, that every living creature which swarmeth <S%H2416><s%>, in every place <S%H8317><s%> whither the rivers <S%H5158><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, shall live <S%H2421><s%>; and there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> multitude of fish <S%H1710><s%>; for these waters <S%H4325><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> thither <S%H7495><s%>, and the waters of the sea shall be healed, and everything shall live <S%H2425><s%> whithersoever the river <S%H5158><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H1728><s%>, that fishers shall stand <S%H5975><s%> by it <S%H5872><s%>: from En-gedi even unto En-eglaim <S%H5882><s%> shall be a place for the spreading <S%H4894><s%> of nets <S%H2764><s%>; their fish <S%H1710><s%> shall be after their kinds <S%H4327><s%>, as the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, exceeding <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>.
But the miry places <S%H1207><s%> thereof <S%H1360><s%>, and the marshes thereof <S%H7495><s%>, shall not be healed; they shall be given <S%H5414><s%> up to salt <S%H4417><s%>.

And by the river <S%H5158><s%> upon the bank <S%H8193><s%> thereof <S%H5927><s%>, on this side and on that side, shall grow every tree <S%H6086><s%> for food <S%H3978><s%>, whose leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall not whither <S%H5034><s%>, neither shall the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof fail <S%H8552><s%>: it shall bring forth new fruit <S%H1069><s%> every month <S%H2320><s%>, because the waters <S%H4325><s%> thereof issue out <S%H3318><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>; and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof shall be for food <S%H3978><s%>, and the leaf <S%H5929><s%> thereof for healing <S%H8644><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: This <S%H1454><s%> shall be the border <S%H1366><s%>, whereby ye shall divide the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall have two portions <S%H2256><s%>.

And ye shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> it <S%H376><s%>, one as well as another <S%H251><s%>; for I <S%H5375><s%> sware <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>: and this land <S%H776><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> unto you for inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

And this shall be the border <S%H1366><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: On the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, from the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, by the way <S%H1870><s%> of Hethlon <S%H2855><s%>, unto the entrance <S%H935><s%> of Zedad <S%H6657><s%>;

Hamath <S%H2574><s%>, Berothah <S%H1268><s%>, Sibraim <S%H5453><s%>, which is between the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hamath <S%H2574><s%>; Hazer-hatticon <S%H2694><s%>, which is by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hauran <S%H2362><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> from the sea <S%H3220><s%>, shall be Hazar-enon <S%H2703><s%> at the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%>; and on the north <S%H6828><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> is the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hamath <S%H2574><s%>. This is the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>.

And the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, between <S%H996><s%> Hauran <S%H2362><s%> and <S%H996><s%> Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and <S%H996><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, shall be the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>; from <S%H996><s%> the north border <S%H1366><s%> unto the east <S%H6931><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> shall ye measure <S%H4058><s%>. This is the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>.

And the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%> shall be from Tamar <S%H8559><s%> as far as the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meriboth <S%H4808><s%> - kadesh <S%H6946><s%>, to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt <S%H1419><s%>, unto the great sea <S%H3220><s%>. This is the south <S%H8486><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>.

And the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> shall be the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, from the south border <S%H1366><s%> as far as <S%H935><s%> over against <S%H5227><s%> the entrance of Hamath <S%H2574><s%>. This is the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>.
So shall ye divide <S%H2505><s%> this land <S%H776><s%> unto you according to the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H5307><s%>, that ye shall divide it by lot for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto you and to the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H3205><s%>, who shall beget children <S%H1121><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H249><s%>; and they shall be unto you as the home - born <S%H249><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; they shall have <S%H5307><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with you among <S%H8432><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H7626><s%>, that in what tribe the stranger <S%H1616><s%> sojourneth <S%H1481><s%>, there shall ye give <S%H5414><s%> him his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
